channel.itunes:keywords: sermon, daily sermon, message, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God, 163859
channel.googleplay:description: One classic John Piper sermon or conference message for each day of the year, based on listeners’ recommendations and feedback. Piper is founder and teacher of desiringGod.org and is author of more than 50 books. His sermons, books, articles, and more are available free of charge at desiringGod.org.
channel.itunes:author: Desiring God

item.title: Let Marriage Be Held in Honor
item.itunes:subtitle: Thinking Biblically About So-Called Same-Sex Marriage
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: So-called same-sex marriage dishonors the partners involved and disregards God’s good design.
item.itunes:keywords: sermon, daily sermon, message, preaching, John Piper, Desiring God, 163859

media:description._: So-called same-sex marriage dishonors the partners involved and disregards God’s good design.

item.itunes:summary: So-called same-sex marriage dishonors the partners involved and disregards God’s good design.

item.title: The Triumph of the Gospel in the New Heavens and the New Earth
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: Death and decay won’t have the last word. One day soon, God will release all of creation from corruption.

item.title: The Echo and the Insufficiency of Hell
item.itunes:author: John Piper

item.title: Manhood and Womanhood Before Sin
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: God calls men to lead but not in a way that’s domineering or selfish. Husbands should be the first to stoop low to serve.

item.title: The Gospel in the Church for the Obedience of Faith Through Spiritual Gifts
item.itunes:author: John Piper
item.dc:creator: John Piper
item.description: Grace pays the debt we owe God for stealing his glory. And now we owe the gospel to any who still need God’s grace.
